thread.title: Pawan Kalyan-Lakshmi Rai's Selfie At Sardaar Gabbar Singh Sets Shakes Twitter
thread.title_full: Pawan Kalyan-Lakshmi Rai's Selfie At Sardaar Gabbar Singh Sets Shakes Twitter

title: Pawan Kalyan-Lakshmi Rai's Selfie At Sardaar Gabbar Singh Sets Shakes Twitter
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
It is known that Pawan Kalyan has joined the sets of Sardaar Gabbar Singh a couple of days ago and a song is being shot on the star and Lakshmi Rai during this schedule at a specially erected set in Hyderabad. 
As promised earlier, Lakshmi Rai posted a selfie of hers with Pawan Kalyan, which took twitter by storm in no time. Like I promised u all ! here is the selfie with #pspk to all his fans n mine fans enjoy... Love u all ğŸ˜˜â¤ï¸ pic.twitter.com/LjhKNxaXnf â€” RAAI LAXMI (@iamlakshmirai) October 2, 2015 
Stunned by the response the actress posted two more pictures with Pawan Kalyan, which made the actor trend nation wide with in minutes even at the wee hours. Exclusive pic with #pspk wat a gem of a person I must sayğŸ‘ŒğŸ» from the sets of #SardaarGabbarSingh #songnscene ğŸ’ƒğŸ‘ğŸ˜Š pic.twitter.com/RMBlLFuJeC â€” RAAI LAXMI (@iamlakshmirai) October 2, 2015 
Lakshmi Rai also revealed that she is playing an important role in Sardaar Gabbar Singh and not just doing an item number. She preferred to call her special song with the actor an inspirational one rather than an item song. To al the fans tis is not an item song,it's an inspirational song in the film hence told u wil luv n remember this role #SardaarGabbarSingh
